odpovede: Assassin's Creed Shadows follows a new narrative that blends the old-world tactics of assassins with new stealth-based mechanics.
The main protagonist is a character named Naoe, who seeks revenge while uncovering dark secrets about the mysterious box stolen from her.
In Assassin's Creed Shadows, new stealth mechanics such as light and shadow manipulation, as well as parkour-focused combat, have been introduced.

There are multiple game editions of Assassin's Creed Shadows:

• Standard Edition:
  - Assassin's Creed Shadows (base game)

• Digital Deluxe Edition:
  - Assassin's Creed Shadows (base game)

Minimum requirements (1080p at 30 FPS, Low graphics preset): Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit), AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core i7-8700k, 16 GB RAM (dual-channel), AMD RX 5700, Intel Arc A580, or NVIDIA GTX 1070 (8 GB), SSD required, DirectX 12.
Operating system: Windows 10/11 (64-bit), Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core i7-8700k, RAM: 16 GB (dual-channel), GPU: RX 5700, Arc A580, or GTX 1070 (8 GB), SSD: required, DirectX: 12.
